TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs extends System.EventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs Inherits EventArgs
public ref class WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs sealed : EventArgs

summary.span: 为 WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate 事件提供数据\*\*\*\*。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于向**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件提供事件值并使你能够为当前请求指定自定义 Windows 标识。The class is used to supply event values to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event and to enable you to specify a custom Windows identity for the current request. 使用 IIS 提供的 Windows 标识构造对象， 并将其传递给**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件。The constructs a object using the Windows identity supplied by IIS and the current and passes it to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event. 您可以使用 提供给 **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** 事件的对象的属性，将 当前的属性设置 为自定义 对象。You can use the property of the object supplied to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the property of the current to a custom object. 如果未在 **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** 事件期间为属性指定值，则 IIS 提供的 Windows 标识将用作当前请求的标识。If you do not specify a value for the property during the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the Windows identity supplied by IIS is used as the identity for the current request. 如果 IIS 使用匿名身份验证，则 属性将设置为该方法返回的标识 。If IIS uses anonymous authentication, then the property is set to the identity returned by the method. 仅**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**当身份验证 设置为 ，并且 是应用程序的活动 HTTP 模块时，才引发 WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate 事件。The **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is raised only when the authentication is set to and the is an active HTTP module for the application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** 事件将 当前的属性设置 为自定义 对象。The following code example uses the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the property of the current to a custom object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule/VB/global.asax#1)]
